description.oldValue:
Teams users can connect a Stream Deck device to their Teams desktop client and utilize it to mute/unmute themselves, turn on/off their camera or send reactions during a Teams meeting.
GA date: March CY2023
description.newValue:
Teams users can connect a Stream Deck device to
their Teams desktop client and utilize it to mute/unmute themselves, turn
on/off their camera or send reactions during a Teams meeting.
